participant_1.background:
I am a mother of two beautiful boys.
My family and i go camping every month.
My favorite artist is justin bieber.
I love to go horseback riding whenever i can.

participant_2.background:
I am a librarian in my current job.
I have two cats.
My cats like to be read to.
I like to read books.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1. What's your name?
My name is participant_2. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you do for fun?
I'm a librarian, so I like to read books. I also have two cats that I love to read to.
I love books too! I have two boys who are always begging me to read to them.
That's great! What are your favorite books to read to them?
I love reading them anything by Dr. Seuss. They love the rhymes and the silly pictures.
Those are great books! I love Dr. Seuss too.
I also love reading them picture books with lots of action. They love to follow the story as the characters move around.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure your boys love it when you read to them.
They do! It's one of our favorite things to do together.
That's great! I'm glad you're able to spend time with your boys reading to them.
Me too! It's a great way to bond with them and teach them new things.
I agree! Reading is such a important skill. It's great that you're encouraging them to read at a young age.
I am! I want them to have a love of reading like I do.
I'm sure they will! You're a great mom.
